subject: Soccer
Zika Virus
Olympic Games (2016)
Women and Girls
Travel Warnings
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Olympic and sports federation officials have reacted to the Zika virus threat at the Rio Games in such an unhurried way that some view it as tone deafness.
snippet: Olympic and sports federation officials have reacted to the Zika virus threat at the Rio Games in such an unhurried way that some view it as tone deafness.
